Package org.apache.wayang.core.mapping

Class PlanTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.mapping.PlanTransformation
  • public class PlanTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Looks for a SubplanPattern in a WayangPlan and replaces it with an alternative Operators.

    • Method Detail

      • thatReplaces

        public PlanTransformation thatReplaces()
        Make this instance replace on matches instead of introducing alternatives.
        Returns:
        this instance

      • transform

        public int transform​(WayangPlan plan,
                     int epoch)
        Apply this transformation exhaustively on the current plan.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to which the transformation should be applied
        epoch - (i) the epoch for new plan parts and (ii) match only operators whose epoch is equal to or greater than epoch-1
        Returns:
        the number of applied transformations
        See Also:
        Operator.getEpoch()

      • getTargetPlatforms

        public java.util.Collection<Platform> getTargetPlatforms()
